-- This file is generated from CourseSection.ump --


MODULE Status
  
  VAR 
    state : { status_Planned , status_OpenNotEnoughStudents , status_OpenEnoughStudents , status_Cancelled , status_Closed }; 
    event : { cancel , openRegistration , requestToRegister , closeRegistration , classSizeExceedsMinimum , classSizeExceedsMaximum };      
  ASSIGN
    init(state) := status_Planned;    
  TRANS
    ( (state = status_Planned) -> (
      (event = cancel & next(state) = status_Cancelled)  |
      (event = openRegistration & next(state) = status_OpenNotEnoughStudents)  ) ) &
    ( (state = status_OpenNotEnoughStudents) -> (
      (event = requestToRegister & next(state) = status_OpenNotEnoughStudents)  |
      (event = closeRegistration & next(state) = status_Cancelled)  |
      (event = cancel & next(state) = status_Cancelled)  |
      (event = classSizeExceedsMinimum & next(state) = status_OpenEnoughStudents)  ) ) &
    ( (state = status_OpenEnoughStudents) -> (
      (event = cancel & next(state) = status_Cancelled)  |
      (event = requestToRegister & next(state) = status_OpenEnoughStudents)  |
      (event = closeRegistration & next(state) = status_Closed)  |
      (event = classSizeExceedsMaximum & next(state) = status_Closed)  ) ) &
    ( (state = status_Closed) -> (
       event = cancel & next(state) = status_Cancelled) ) &
    ( (state = status_Cancelled) -> (next(state) = state) )
  
MODULE main
  
  VAR 
    status : Status;
